subject: Your controller with Simjack UT
description_text:
Is swapping the control boxes possible? I'm about to buy Simsonn VAM haptic rumble and they require a controller. I might as well go for the Pro X Ultra controller to not only have it as all-in-one but also have access to Simsonn control software which appears a tad more polished.
https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor
Regards!

conversations.body_text: Hi Konrad Bogucki,  SimJack UT is compatible with our main controller and VAM Pro motor.Â

Thanks. Bought a set of 3 rotary motors plus the small controller.

Sent from Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
